doc.title: Amasethingi wephasi loke

example.domain: Ungangezelela ibizo lesizinda, njenge-{{url}}, ukukhipha loke ibizo lesizinda.
example.url: Ungakhipha amalinki athileko ngokufaka isixhumanisi, njenge-{{url}}.
example.glob: Ungangeza iphetheni ye-{{glob}}, njenge-{{minimatch}}, ukumadanisa okungakacaci.

doc.script: Ungasebenzisa namaskripthi we-js ukufikelela ukulawula okuyinkimbinkimbi.
doc.checkedUseScript: Ukuthi uvumela iskripthi sakho na, tjheja bona kufuze utjheje womabili amabhokisi ngesikhathi sinye ukuvumela iskripthi.

example1.commentTitle: Njenganje kuwebhusayithi ye-{{youtube}}, udinga ukuvula ikhasi le-{{bukela}} nofana le-{{i-shorts}} le-{{youtube}} kuthebhu etja.
example1.page: : I-variable yinto ye-URL yekhasi lewebhu lamanje. Sibawa ubone</a >
example1.isSameSubDomain: {{isSameSubDomain}}: Ibizo lesizinda elifanako. amabizo wabo wesizinda ahlukile.
example1.minimatch: : {{glob}} indlela yokumadanisa, ngokusebenzisa ilayibrari ye-{{minimatch}}, indlela yokusebenzisa Sibawa Bona, namkha ungasesha bona i-{{glob}} ingayisebenzisa njani.
example1.wholeCode: Ihlathululo yekhodi yoke kukuthi njenganje ekhasini lebizo lesizinda le-YouTube {{www}}, nangabe isixhumanisi esichofoziweko ligama lesizinda elifanako begodu indlela ithoma ngo-{{bukela}} nofana {{amafitjhani}}, khona-ke ithebhu etja ikhasi elingakwesokudla lizokuvulwa.
